subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Hanley Ramírez led off the game with one of Florida’s three home runs against Philadelphia starter Brett Myers, and the host Marlins went on to defeat the N.L. East-leading Phillies.
snippet: Hanley Ramírez led off the game with one of Florida’s three home runs against Philadelphia starter Brett Myers, and the host Marlins went on to defeat the N.L. East-leading Phillies.
